explanation: The XML was faulty because the TITLE tag was not closed properly. It was closed after the PRICE tag, instead of right after the title text. Two fixes were made: 1) The TITLE tag was closed right after the title text. 2) A new TITLE tag was opened before the price information and closed right after it.
